data.description:
Welcome to the Knockout League, a single player arcade style boxing game built from the ground up for Virtual Reality. Its intuitive gameplay involves moving and dodging with your body and 1:1 punch movement that lets you attack how you want without relying on buttons for main gameplay. Train up with various boxing drills to take on a crazy cast of characters with different fighting styles and gameplay in order to become the champion of the Knockout League!

Oculus Cross-Buy enabled!

changelog.change_log:
•	Crimson Fang and Magician added to MR Fights
•	All MR opponents accessible from the start
•	Reflex Alley mode added to MR training
•	Improvements to Focus Mitts Timed mode sequences
•	Improvements to Heavy Bag Timed mode target spawning
•	Improved aspects of Showtime fight
•	New MR related audio cues
•	Visual updates to Crimson Fang model
•	Other minor bugs/issues addressed
* Additional fix to ensure your achievements sync with the network, particularly for when you're disconnected from wi-fi when they were earned

* Fixed issue that prevented achievements from registering with Oculus
* Fixed issue that prevented leaderboards from loading or registering with Oculus

Knockout League Change Log
* Adjusted tutorial positioning and added ability to skip tutorial steps
* Increased timing window for a strong block
* Adjusted many fighter attack hitboxes
* Adjusted the interrupt windows for a few moves across the roster
* Added a feature to assist in player punches reaching opponents
* Round length increased to 8 minutes
* Texture quality improvements
* Various other minor fixes

PATCH 3 RC 1: Potential fix for Tri-Tip freezing on new installs: "Moving right jab inactive anim notify further from danger area so that it triggers more reliably.  possible fix for tri tip fight hanging "
PATCH 2 RC 3: Fixed a bug where captions continued to play after backing out from Focus Mitts. Fixed a typo in drill 3 and a missing caption when starting timed mode. Incremented store version to 33

Patch 1 RC 3: -Captions system: The user can now turn on English captions for the tutorial and cinematic. Captions are turned on by default. -Tutorial improvements: Doug's pads now flash green when he holds them up during the tutorial, which should clarify what the player is supposed to do after dodging or blocking
Release candidate 2: Updated the credits to include everyone that worked on the Quest version

Release candidate 1: Optimized a rare particle that can play when hitting two incorrect portals in a row during the magician's fight, fixed OKL-137, reverted lighting changes in the Stadium that caused OKL-132, updated PSO cache to include Magician optimizations

Fixes for OKL-73/76/69, fixed weird inconsistancies with Octopunch's camo in grudge match, fixed a bug with the wrong hit effect being played when hitting Showtime under the right circumstances, raised Showtime up a bit so his stuff doesn't clip into the floor during his knockout, fixed a bug where the golden glove materials don't change fast enough when in the zone
